prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
You are certainly no friend of mine. You have accused me of lying about what you had said, and run away when I proved by actual quotation that the accusation was false. We both know that, even though you praise humility, you are not humble enough to apologize.

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" An actual friend would not have written such things.

No, you are no friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you
stories:
I must admit, our friendship seems questionable based on your past actions. You have publicly challenged my honesty by accusing me of fabricating your statements, yet failed to acknowledge the truth when presented with evidence to the contrary.

Your derogatory comments about my military service were uncalled for. You once remarked, "Many so-called 'combat veterans' of Vietnam were more familiar with the scent of perfume from call girls than with the smell of cordite," and "As an Army officer in Vietnam, with two battalions of infantry marines at the ready, how much M-16 ammo did each soldier carry daily on patrol?" Such words are not those of a true friend.

The truth is, we have grown apart, and I can no longer consider you a friend. You come across as an ignorant, arrogant, and hypocritical individual. It should be apparent by now that my sentiments towards you are far from friendly.

Admittedly, the foundation of our friendship appears doubtful given your past behavior. You have cast doubt on my integrity by insinuating that I have fabricated your statements, but when confronted with proof to the contrary, you have declined to acknowledge the truth.

Previously, you stated, "Many individuals who claim to be 'combat veterans' of Vietnam were more accustomed to the aroma of perfume from call girls than to the scent of cordite," and "As an Army officer in Vietnam, with two infantry marine battalions under your command, how much M-16 ammunition did each soldier carry daily during patrols?" Such remarks do not resonate with those of a genuine friend.

In fact, we have drifted apart, and I can no longer view you as a friend. Your ignorance, arrogance, and hypocrisy are evident to me. It is clear that my feelings towards you are far from amicable.
